item.title: UAE’s Falcon 3 challenges open-source leaders amid surging demand for small AI models
item.description: The UAE-backed institute has released Falcon 3 in four different sizes with the goal of democratizing access to advanced AI capabilities.

item.title: OpenAI opens up its most powerful model, o1, to third-party developers
item.description: A major step forward for devs looking to build new advanced AI applications or integrate the most advanced OpenAI tech.

item.title: Salt AI raises $3M for AI workflow orchestration
item.description: Salt, an AI workflow orchestration firm for enterprises, raised $3 million in seed funding and appointed Aber Whitcomb as CEO.

item.title: Google upgrades its programming agent Code Assist with Gemini 2.0, adds source integrations
item.description: Google's enterprise-focused Code Assist will now be powered by Gemini 2.0 and connect to tools like Atlassian, GitHub and GitLab.

item.title: Nvidia and DataStax just made generative AI smarter and leaner — here’s how
item.description: Nvidia and DataStax launch new AI tool that reduces enterprise data storage costs by 35x while enabling multilingual retrieval, transforming how compa...
